MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am to install specialist fault finding equipment onto our network. This is to assist in locating the fault which has caused the recent power cuts in your area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.56am on 5th of November 2020.
